然后execute as @a run title @s actionbar [{"text":"血量: "},{"score":{"objective":"health","name":"@s"},"color":"red","bold":true},{"text":"/20 "}]
下面这条放在1.12和往下是execute @a ~ ~ ~ title @s actionbar [{"text":"血量: "},{"score":{"objective":"health","name":"@s"},"color":"red","bold":true},{"text":"/20 "}]

replies.author: linsmc
replies.txt_content:
安装Papi前置（如果已安装可以跳过） 装进入载入一次服务器 再把这个变量拓展放到\plugins\PlaceholderAPI\expansions文件夹里 再输入/papi reload重载插件就可以了 当前血量的变量为%player_health% 血量最大上限为%player_max_health%
然后安装一个支持papi的t显插件
